arch_marine.name: Arch-Marine
arch_marine.description: One of the original founders of the Imperial Marines and an extremely powerful leader.

grav_captain.name: Prime Gravite Captain
grav_captain.description: A fearless next-generation leader in experimental Gravite armor.

marine_zealot.name: Marine Zealot
marine_zealot.description: An armored priest who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

marine_zealot_on_bike.name: Marine Zealot on Bike
marine_zealot_on_bike.description: An armored priest on a combat bike who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

prime_zealot.name: Prime Zealot
prime_zealot.description: A next generation armored priest who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

prime_zealot_on_bike.name: Prime Zealot on Bike
prime_zealot_on_bike.description: A next-generation armored priest on a combat bike who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

surgeon.name: Surgeon
surgeon.description: A fearless battlefield medic trained in saving lives.

surgeon_on_bike.name: Surgeon on Bike
surgeon_on_bike.description: A fearless battlefield medic trained in saving lives.

prime_surgeon.name: Prime Surgeon
prime_surgeon.description: A fearless next-generation battlefield medic trained in saving lives.

prime_surgeon_on_bike.name: Prime Surgeon on Bike
prime_surgeon_on_bike.description: A fearless next-generation battlefield medic trained in saving lives.

imperial_swordmaster.name: Imperial Swordmaster
imperial_swordmaster.description: A fearless swordsman trained in hunting enemy leaders.

imperial_marines.name: Imperial Marines
imperial_marines.description: Elite trained marines sworn to protect the Empire.

assault_squad.name: Assault Squad
assault_squad.description: A squad of elite marines trained to fight in close combat.

scout_marines.name: Scout Marines
scout_marines.description: Elite trained marines sworn to protect the Empire.

prime_marines.name: Prime Marines
prime_marines.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed.

prime_assault_squad.name: Prime Assault Squad
prime_assault_squad.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed.

prime_infiltration_squad.name: Prime Infiltration Squad
prime_infiltration_squad.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

prime_sniper_squad.name: Prime Sniper Squad
prime_sniper_squad.description: Elite trained marines with long ranged weapons, tasked with eliminating threats.

strike_team.name: Strike Team
strike_team.description: Elite, well-equipped marines grouped up into deadly strike teams.

hazard_marines.name: Hazard Marines
hazard_marines.description: Elite, well-equipped marines specialising in chemical and radiological weaponry.

prime_strike_team.name: Prime Strike Team
prime_strike_team.description: Elite, well-equipped marines grouped up into deadly strike teams.

honor_guard.name: Honor Guard
honor_guard.description: Marines clad in golden armor and wings with dangerous melee weapons.

werewolves.name: Werewolves
werewolves.description: Marines that are half marine and half werewolf.

prime_grav_squad.name: Prime Gravite Squad
prime_grav_squad.description: Marines wearing experimental Gravite armor with devastating weapons.

prime_devastator_squad.name: Prime Devastators
prime_devastator_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with deadly heavy weapons.

prime_heavy_devastator_squad.name: Prime Heavy Devastators
prime_heavy_devastator_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with deadly heavy weapons.

marine_bikers.name: Marine Biker Squad
marine_bikers.description: Upgraded and highly trained bikers armed to the teeth.

prime_marine_bikers.name: Prime Marine Biker Squad
prime_marine_bikers.description: Imperial marines of a new breed on combat bikes.

combat_speeders.name: Combat Speeders
combat_speeders.description: Fast-flying hovercraft designed to rush down the opponent.

furious_assault_squad.name: Furious Marines
furious_assault_squad.description: A squad of especially angry assault marines.

destroyers.name: Destroyers
destroyers.description: Highly trained marines clad in very heavy armor.

devastator_squad.name: Devastator Squad
devastator_squad.description: A squad of highly trained marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

heavy_devastator_squad.name: Heavy Devastator Squad
heavy_devastator_squad.description: A squad of highly trained marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

marine_apc.name: APC
marine_apc.description: A durable transport built by the imperial marines.

drop_pod.name: Drop Pod
drop_pod.description: A durable transport built by the imperial marines.

marine_artillery_vehicle.name: Artillery Vehicle
marine_artillery_vehicle.description: An armored artillery vehicle helmed by imperial marines.

marine_battle_tank.name: Battle Tank
marine_battle_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by imperial marines.

marine_strike_tank.name: Strike Tank
marine_strike_tank.description: A slightly lighter armed tank helmed by imperial marines.

marine_heavy_battle_tank.name: Heavy Battle Tank
marine_heavy_battle_tank.description: An heavy armored tank helmed by imperial marines.

marine_assault_juggernaut.name: Marine Assault Juggernaut
marine_assault_juggernaut.description: A heavily armed combat walker kitted for melee destruction.

veteran_marine_juggernaut.name: Veteran Marine Juggernaut
veteran_marine_juggernaut.description: An elite and heavily armed combat walker.

captain_juggernaut.name: Marine Juggernaut Captain
captain_juggernaut.description: An elite and heavily armed combat walker piloted by a fearless leader.

marine_heavy_gunship.name: Marine Heavy Gunship
marine_heavy_gunship.description: A heavy transport and fire support gunship.

psychic_grand_master.name: Psychic Grand Master
psychic_grand_master.description: A Master of psychic powers and martial combat, wielding heavy destroyer armor.

psychic_walker.name: Psychic Walker
psychic_walker.description: A heavy psychic walker with heavy weapons and extreme combat prowess.

grand_master_walker.name: Grand Master Walker
grand_master_walker.description: A large psychic walker with heavy weapons and extreme combat prowess.

psychic_ancient.name: Psychic Ancient
psychic_ancient.description: A psychic marine carrying a sacred banner.

psychic_destroyer_ancient.name: Psychic Destroyer Ancient
psychic_destroyer_ancient.description: A psychic destroyer marine carrying a sacred banner.

psychic_marine_squad.name: Psychic Marines
psychic_marine_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

purge_squad.name: Purge Marines
purge_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons with heavy psychic weapons.

teleport_squad.name: Teleport Squad
teleport_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons with teleporting backpacks.

psychic_destroyers.name: Psychic Destroyers
psychic_destroyers.description: Marines in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_paladins.name: Psychic Paladins
psychic_paladins.description: Tough marines in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

multi_scanner.name: Multi-Scanner
multi_scanner.description: Once per round, this unit may re-roll an Initiative test.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Any successful rolls that would allow you to ignore hits must be re-rolled against hits from this weapon

magnetic_grapple.name: Magnetic Grapple
magnetic_grapple.description: Units engaged in Melee with a model that has this weapon suffer -2 to Initiative tests when escaping combat for each model with this rule.

blinding_light.name: Blinding Light
blinding_light.description: Enemy models suffer -1 Strength when targeting this model with a Melee attack.

sweeping.name: Sweeping
sweeping.description: Strength rolls of 1 or 2 with this weapon cause 2 hits instead of 1.

legend_charge.name: Charge Leader
legend_charge.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 3" gain +3" Movement on any _Charge_ actions.

legend_hammer.name: Righteousness
legend_hammer.description: On a turn where this model charges, all Melee attacks gain +1 AP.

walker_transport.name: Walker Transport
walker_transport.description: This model may carry X _Walker_ or _Juggernaut_  models inside of it.

hunter_team.name: Hunter Team
hunter_team.description: At the start of the game, choose a unit category. Accuracy and Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP against units in that category.

arch_tactics.name: Arch-Marine Tactics
arch_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll all failed Accuracy tests 
 * Re-roll all failed Strength tests 
 * Re-roll all failed Initiative tests

walker_tactics.name: Walker Tactics
walker_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Walker_ or _Juggernaut_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

melee_tactics_bike.name: Biker Melee Tactics
melee_tactics_bike.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ or _Biker_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

expert_marksman.name: Expert Marksman
expert_marksman.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 3" gain +1 to hit with shooting attacks.

ancient_armor.name: Ancient Armor
ancient_armor.description: This model may re-roll 1 failed Save roll.

legend_remembrance.name: Armor of Remembrance
legend_remembrance.description: When this model is hit by an attack, roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that attack is prevented.

legend_shard.name: Demonic Shard
legend_shard.description: This model increases all power charge values by 1.

warding_staff.name: Warding
warding_staff.description: Enemy units suffer -1 to all Power(x) test while within 12" of this model.

duelist.name: Duelist
duelist.description: This model gains +1 strength when targeting enemy Leader models

reinforced_armor.name: Reinforced Armor
reinforced_armor.description: Subtract 1 from all Damage Chart rolls for this model.

hidden_relics.flavor: Ancient armour said to protect the wearer from significant harm.
A chainsword crafted to destroy even the toughest enemy infantry.
A trained marksman can have a very deadly effect.
A well-trained tactician in mobility warfare.
A trained fighter can dispatch even the toughest foes in deadly combat.

legend_gravity_field.name: Gravity Field
legend_gravity_field.flavor: This gravity field generator can be overcharged to bounce even the toughest attacks for a moment.

legend_remembrance.name: Armor of Remembrance
legend_remembrance.description: Upgrade one model with Armor of Remembrance.
legend_remembrance.flavor: This armor serves as a reminder to those who have fallen before them.

legend_shard.name: Demonic Shard
legend_shard.description: Upgrade one model with Demonic Shard.
legend_shard.flavor: This demonic crystal is imbued with psychic energy.

legend_staff.name: The Warding Staff
legend_staff.description: Replace one Leader model's Psychic Staff with The Warding Staff.
legend_staff.flavor: This staff has the power to absorb and stop psychic energy.

legend_righteousness.name: Righteousness
legend_righteousness.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Righteousness.
legend_righteousness.flavor: This model's purpose is pure and aim is righteous.

legend_charge.name: Charge Leader
legend_charge.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Charge Leader.
legend_charge.flavor: This model is known to be on the front line leading the first charge against the enemy.

the_black_blade.name: The Black Blade
the_black_blade.description: Replace one Leader model's Psychic Sword with The Black Blade.
the_black_blade.flavor: This blade is bound with the soul of a powerful demon, giving incredible strength.

strategies.name: Vigilance
strategies.description: Use when taking an Initiative test for a reaction. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Genetically Engineered
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ or _Biker_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
strategies.flavor: With the best implants and engineering that can be found, it's easy to take a hit and keep standing.

strategies.name: Fearless
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
strategies.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

banishment.name: Banishment
banishment.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(7).

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 8 automatic hits with AP 0.

empower.name: Empower
empower.description: Target friendly unit within 12 gains +1 Strength and +1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

snare.name: Snare
snare.description: Target enemy unit within 18" has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Target friendly unit within 24. Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.
